item.title: Hospira, Inc., Issues A Voluntary Nationwide Recall for one lot of BACTERIOSTATIC WATER for Injection, USP, due to a Potential Lack of Sterility Assurance
item.description: Hospira, Inc., a Pfizer company, is voluntarily recalling BACTERIOSTATIC WATER for Injection, USP, 30 mL, multi-dose vial, lot W20308, to the Hospital/Retail level. Hospira initiated this recall due to lack of confirmation of sterilization for some vials from this lot.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Great One Trading Inc. Issues Allergy Alert on Undeclared Egg in Fish Cakes
item.description: Great One Trading Inc. is recalling the above because it may contain undeclared egg. People who have an allergy or severe sensitivity to egg run the risk of serious or life-threatening allergic reaction if they consume these products.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Great One Trading Inc. Issues Expanding Allergy Alert on Undeclared Egg In Fishball Products
item.description: Great One Trading Inc. is recalling the above because it may contain undeclared egg. People who have an allergy or severe sensitivity to egg run the risk of serious or life-threatening allergic reaction if they consume these products.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Dog Goods USA LLC To Conduct A Voluntary Recall of Chef Toby Pig Ears Treats Because of Possible Salmonella Health Risk
item.description: Dog Goods USA LLC to conduct a voluntary recall of Chef Toby Pig Ears Treats because of possible salmonella health risk.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Dog Goods USA LLC Expands Voluntary Recall of Chef Toby Pig Ears Pet Treats Because of Possible Salmonella Health Risk on 9/3/2019
item.description: Dog Goods is voluntarily expanding this recall to include all 30-packs of "Berkley & Jensen" brand pig ears sold at BJ's Wholesale Club stores. Dog Goods purchased these pig ears from a single supplier in Brazil from September 2018 through August 2019.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Hiland Dairy Announces Voluntary Recall of Hiland Dairy Half-Gallon and Pint Lemonades
item.description: Hiland Dairy is announcing a voluntary recall of one-half gallon (64-ounce) and pint (12-ounce) lemonade that is produced at the Chandler, Oklahoma facility, over concerns the products may contain milk that could affect those individuals that have sensitivity to dairy milk allergens.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Pacifico National, Inc. dba AmEx Pharmacy Issues Voluntary Nationwide Recall for all Lots of Bevacizumab
item.description: AmEx Pharmacy today announces a voluntary recall of all Lots of Bevacizumab 1.25mg/0.05mL 31G Injectable and all Lots of Bevacizumab 2.5mg/0.1ml Normject TB Injectable that are within expiry to the healthcare provider level. These lots are being recalled out of an abundance of caution following an F
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Mountain Mel’s Essential Goods, LLC Recalls The Milk Lady’s Herbal Tea Blend, Peaceful Baby Herbal Tea Blend, and Diges-teas Herbal Tea Blend, Because of Possible Health Risk
item.description: Mountain Mel’s Essential Goods, LLC of Welches, OR is recalling The Milk Lady’s Tea with LOT # ML6271950, Peaceful Baby Herbal Tea with LOT # PB781950, and Diges-Teas Herbal Tea with LOT # DT7619100, because it has the potential to be contaminated with Salmonella, an organism which can cause serious
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Makzemo LLC Recalls Balquis Yemeni Spice Because of Possible Health Risk
item.description: Makzemo LLC of Brooklyn, NY is recalling Balquis Yemeni spice, because it has the potential to be contaminated with lead.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Brutus & Barnaby LLC recalls all size bags of “Pig Ears Natural Treats for Dogs” because of a possible salmonella health risk
item.description: Brutus & Barnaby of Clearwater, Florida is recalling all size variations of our Pig Ears for Dogs because it has the potential to be contaminated with Salmonella. Salmonella can affect animals eating the products and there is risk to humans from handling contaminated pet products, especially if they
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Nature’s One Voluntarily Issues Allergy Alert for Undeclared Milk Allergen
item.description: Nature’s One, Lewis Center, Ohio is recalling PediaSmart® SOY Vanilla Beverage Mix because milk is not listed under the “contains” label statement. Each lot is tested for milk allergen by independent 3rd party laboratories before release for sale.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Krasnyi Oktyabr USA Inc Issues Alert on Undeclared Sulfites in “Tainy Vostoka Assorted Dry Fruits Apple”
item.description: Krasnyi Oktyabr USA Inc of Brooklyn, NY is recalling its 500gram (17.65oz) packages of “TAINY VOSTOKA ASSORTED DRIED FRUITS -APPLE” because they contain undeclared sulfites.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Krasnyi Oktyabr USA Inc Issues Alert on Undeclared Sulfites in “Tainy Vostoka Assorted Dry Fruits Quince”
item.description: Krasnyi Oktyabr USA Inc of Brooklyn, NY is recalling its 500gram (17.65oz) packages of “TAINY VOSTOKA ASSORTED DRIED FRUITS - QUINCE” because they contain undeclared sulfites
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Altaire Pharmaceuticals, Inc. Issues Voluntary Recall Of Veterinary Ophthalmic Products
item.description: Altaire Pharmaceuticals, Inc., announces today that it is voluntarily recalling the Veterinary ophthalmic drug products and lots, within expiry, identified below. This recall is only for the specific lots listed. No other lots are being recalled.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Allergy Alert for Undeclared Egg in “Decorated Red Apple Cookies” Issued by Southern Pacific Whole Foods Market Stores
item.description: “Decorated Red Apple Cookies” are being voluntarily recalled by Southern Pacific Whole Foods Market stores because they may contain undeclared egg
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Voluntarily Recalls Grained Salmon Caviar 95g Because of Possible Health Risk
item.description: The product with these codes may have the potential to be contaminated with Clostridium botulinum, a bacterium which can cause life-threatening illness or death. Consumers are warned not to use the product even if it does not look or smell spoiled.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: AWERS, Inc. Recalls Grained Salmon Caviar 95g Because of Possible Health Risk
item.description: AWERS, Inc. of Bellevue, WA is recalling Grained Salmon Caviar 95g (Sockeye Salmon Caviar) with “BEST BEFORE OCT 07 2020”, because it has the potential to be contaminated with Clostridium botulinum, a bacterium which can cause life-threatening illness or death.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: FDA Cautions Pet Owners Not to Feed Texas Tripe Inc. Raw Pet Food Due to Salmonella, Listeria monocytogenes
item.description: FDA is cautioning pet owners not to feed pets certain lots of Texas Tripe Inc. raw pet food after samples tested positive for Salmonella, Listeria monocytogenes.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Pfizer Inc. Issues a Voluntary Nationwide Recall for 2 Lots of RELPAX® (eletriptan hydrobromide) 40 mg Tablets Due to Potential Microbiological Contamination of Non-Sterile Products
item.description: Pfizer Inc. is voluntarily recalling RELPAX® (eletriptan hydrobromide) 40 mg tablets, lots AR5407 and CD4565, to the Patient level. Pfizer Inc. initiated this recall because these product lots may not meet Pfizer’s in-house microbiological specification for the potential presence of Genus Pseudomona
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Dole Fresh Vegetables Announces Precautionary Limited Recall of Baby Spinach
item.description: The products being recalled are 6 oz Dole Baby Spinach bag, Lot code W20308A (UPC code 0-71430-00964-2), and 10 oz Dole Baby Spinach clamshell, Lot code W203010 (UPC code 0-71430-00016-8), both with Use-by dates of 08-05-2019, due to a possible health risk from Salmonella
item.dc:creator: FDA
